Dankpods is primarily a tech channel whose namesake comes from his hobby of modding ipods. he also screams at headphones sometimes. Wade(Dankpods) also has channels such as 'garbage time'(about cars) 'borkus time' (about games) and 'the drum thing' (mostly vods of his drum streams, and where the cymbal toss comes from)
James channel is a channel of a friend of Wade(Dankpods) that is also primarily tech based however, his channel pertains more towards retro consoles and old computers (and doing sorcery on them)

Dankpods has accomplished much in modding ipods. He has dingus pod, bluetooth ipod, shrek pod, and several other ipods. Other common mods include changing cases, hard drives, and adding additional hardware to ipods
the dingus pod is an ipod that has a hole cut in its case(similar to a phone case, not the ipod itself) that reveals that it has 'Dingus' on the back
the shrek pod is an ipod with its guts exposed for the purpose of having a third party display on it to watch shreak optimally. It has unfortunately passed away.

garbage time is a car channel in which James (the wizard) and Wade(Dankpods) upload videos of them working on cars and each video is a coin flip on whether it is about running a car on nutella, or creating a master pieace (a person with an iq above 30 would know that both are one in the same)
why did you ask about that?
there are a few websites you should visit: 1) dingusland.fun 2) https://www.floatplane.com/channel/TheTrashNetwork/home/dankpods
borkus time is Wade's(Dankpod) gaming channel. Games can either be normal, or a game where you push a button and a frog spins. it's mostly just him cackling as he games
